name: Space Mercenary Defense Force
storyline: You are the planet's last hope to stop the alien invasion and take down the mother ship!
summary: Space Mercenary Defense Force is a 2D sci-fi action-roguelike arena survivor game where you survive against an alien invasion and try to take down the mother ship! Equip your ship with a selection of branching upgrades to create unique builds each game and unlock new ships and permanent upgrades to help win the fight.
